member.name: ISyncMgrResolutionHandler.KeepItems
member.summary: Keeps the Shell items that are passed in.
member.param: A pointer to an array of. The array will contain more than one item if method returned SYNCMGR_RA_KEEP_MULTIPLE in parameter pdwAbilities.
When this method returns, contains a value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrResolutionHandler.KeepOther
member.summary: Replaces the versions in conflict with a different Shell item that is usually a merged version of the originals.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrResolutionHandler.KeepRecent
member.param: When this method returns, contains a value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrResolutionHandler.QueryAbilities
member.summary: Determines what options the conflict presenter will display.
member.param: When this method returns, contains one of the enumerated type.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrResolutionHandler.RemoveFromSyncSet
member.summary: Deletes the conflict and removes the from synchronization.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrResolutionHandler
member.summary: Exposes methods that manage synchronizing conflicts. Implement this interface to construct a sync conflict handler. The conflict resolution user interface (UI) will call this interface to resolve the conflict presented to the user.
